item.title: Huge amounts of dog mess across street, 8th January
item.description:
Our street has been littered with dog mess for many weeks, particularly been 36 Bracondale Road to the end of the road (48 etc). We can’t identify the culprits and it urgently needs cleaning
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bracondale Road, Abbey Wood

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th January
item.description:
I caught this guy fly tipping, he put builders and household rubbish on the street. I approached him and he couldn’t understand me until I said I would report him. I would happily point the guy out in a line up. This part of the street has become a target since the building works started on the house on Brewery Road, including mess from the building works.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Majendie Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Croxted Road SE21 sort of north west corner of jun, 8th January
item.description:
Croxted Road SE21 sort of north west corner of junction with Turney Road ie at the side of 25 Turney Road - road gutter grate chamber below the grate needs slubbing out. (This is on Lambeth side of boundary with Southwark.) Big puddle tonight – I poked a stick into the grate but water did not drain away. Google Streetview of grate: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4466899,-0.0959824,3a,34.6y,268.88h,70.94t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sa3wkf9aWIn2WIEgadJjRLA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D19.06215187077639%26panoid%3Da3wkf9aWIn2WIEgadJjRLA%26yaw%3D268.88055687064315!7i13312!8i6656?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI2MDEwNi4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Turney Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No communial lighting, the local drug pushers keep messing wiht the lights, 8th January
item.description:
No communial lighting, the local drug pushers keep messing wiht the lights. No lights on the last flight of stairs for a few weeks and now no lights on all public corridors in this building. It is a dangerous area to come home to from work and find loiterers (even in the cold) hanging around this building. Please fix these lights, people who live here and work at night need these. Please help. Thank you.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ogilby Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet
